title: anandha naTam aaDuvar
language:
Tamil

Pallavi 

Ananda naTam ADuvAr tillai ambalam tannil aDi
paNIbavark-kapajayam illai 
(Ananda)

Anu
sahitya:
tAnandam illAda rUpan tajjam takajham takajhaNu taLAngu
taka tatingiNatOm
taLAngu taka tatingiNatOm taka dhimi taka tatingiNatOmen 
(nAnanda)

CaraNam 1

vancakam illAda aDiyAr kuvikka vAnavar munivar Anavar
tudikka cancala vizhi
 mAdumaiyAL madikkat-takkiTa tarikiTa tongiTa dhittimi dhimi taka
tatingiNa takatOm
takatOm takatOm taka dhimi taka tatingiNatOmen 
(nAnanda)

CaraNam 2

bhAgya muyalagan mIdoru kAl tAkkip bhaktar tozha maTra oTraikkAlum tUkki
Akki aLippOrai mELakArar Akki ambara nAtha cidambara shambhu sadAshiva sundara
Arai maNi shala shalavena aNi paNi khala khala vena 
(Ananda)

CaraNam 3

pAdi madi jyOti phaLir phaLIr enna pAda shilamboli ghalIr ghalIr
enna
Adi karai uNDa nIlakNTham minna arapura hara shiva sundara aruL gurupara shiva shankara
ANdamum piNDamum AdiDa eNdishaiyum pugazh pAda 
(Ananda)
